ABOUT.ProjectPage: View the Project Page to report issues or comment on this Project at:
ABOUT.SupportTheCreator: If you enjoy (Whisper) Sweet Nothings, please consider donating to the creator at:
ABOUT.Title: (Whisper) Sweet Nothings
ABOUT.Wiki: View the (Whisper) Sweet Nothings wiki at:

ALT.CANCEL: Cancel and close the Sweet Nothings dialog.
ALT.SUBMIT: Submit and send your Sweet Nothings dialog.

DEFAULTS.Hint: These are the default options that will be set anytime you open the Sweet Nothings dialog.  They are per user, so these settings only affect you!
DEFAULTS.Name: Configure Defaults

EXTERNAL_MODULES.Hint: Configure toast and audio notifications for any enabled external modules.
EXTERNAL_MODULES.Name: External Modules

GM_ALWAYS_IC.Hint: Whispers are always flagged as IC, making it play nicely with Tabbed Chat Log module.
GM_ALWAYS_IC.Name: Whispers always flagged IC?

NOTIFICATIONS.Hint: These settings handle whether, and how, you receive notifications when you receive a whisper.
NOTIFICATIONS.Name: Configure Notifications

DIALOG.CHATTEXT: Your message will be posted to chat for everyone to see!

GREETINGS.Defaults: By default, ALT-W will bring up the (Whisper) Sweet Nothings dialog.  You can also use ALT-R to auto-reply to the last whisper you received.   Not to worry, you will not receive this message again.
GREETINGS.Description: This module helps to simplify and expand whisper capabilities.  Enable/disabled Toast notifications, customize sound notification sounds and their volume (including disabling if you so desire!), and allowing for nice, rich text in your whispers or chat text is all at your finger tips.
GREETINGS.Title: Welcome to (Whisper) Sweet Nothings!

SWEETNOTHINGS.HINT: Opens the Sweet Nothings Whisper and Chat Dialog

REPLY.HINT: Opens the Sweet Nothings Dialog, replying to the last whisper sent to you.
REPLY.NAME: Reply using Whisper Sweet Nothings

NOTIFICATIONS.NEW_MESSAGE: You have a new whisper from:

SWEETNOTHINGS.TITLE: Whisper Sweet Nothings

TOOLTIPS.CHATMODE: IC and Emote will cause a bubble around either your selected token or your user defined character's token if no token is selected.
TOOLTIPS.REPLY: Reply to the last whisper you received.

WARNINGS.TARGET_NOT_ONLINE: Target to reply to is not online.
